name: market for silicon tetrahydride | silicon tetrahydride | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9849/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'silicon tetrahydride', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.;silicon tetrahydride'  is an inorganic substance with a CAS no. : 007803-62-5. It is called 'silicon' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: Si. It is gas under normal conditions of temperature and pressure with no information available about its odour. The substance is modelled as a pure substance.  There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on a consumer level. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: chemicals.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'silicon tetrahydride',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  silicon tetrahydride', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
